welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Miller Place, a charming town known for its picturesque beaches and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport primarily serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Long Island Mac Arthur Airport primarily serves international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Igor I. Sikorsky Memorial Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suffolk County Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Suffolk County Airport caters to the needs of private jet owners and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Haven Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New Haven Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Republic Field Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free.
